entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: ÂµBrowser: Watch Web Browser
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$1.99 â†’ $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $1.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.99

Application Description

ÂµBrowser is the micro browser for your Apple Watch. ÂµBrowser is the quick way to do some basic browsing on your Apple Watch when it is necessary. While it is limited it is good way to browse the web when you have no other device around. Features: - Open any URL (Entering a URL works especially good with the new Series 7 keyboard) - Search the web with DuckDuckGo - See your last visited pages - Save pages from the history to your favorites - iOS companion app to manage bookmarks - Complications to quickly access the browser from the watch face Please note: ÂµBrowser is a limited browsing experience. At first it is limited by the device size. Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Religion inc. God Simulator
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Game modesï¼š$2.99 â†’ $1.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]
  • All archetypesï¼š$3.99 â†’ $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $4.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.29

In-App Purchases

  • All at onceï¼š$1.99
  • Chests in the seaï¼š$0.99
  • Game modesï¼š$1.99
  • All archetypesï¼š$1.99
  • Destructiveï¼š$0.99
  • Shamanismï¼š$0.99
  • Totalitarianï¼š$0.99

Application Description

You are reading this text. But why? Are you looking for a game, or has the game found you? Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game. It is a simulation of creating a new reality. Will you shape faith, or will faith shape you? Humanity has always sought light in the darkness. It has always longed to believe in something greater, something that gives meaning to existence. Thatâ€™s how religions were born â€“ as beacons in the storms of history, as compasses in the ocean of life. What if you become the creator of a religion? What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality? You are the Creator. You are the source. You are the inspiration. And if you are reading this text â€“ youâ€™re already in the game! All thatâ€™s left is to install â€“ and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions! Become the source of faith â€“ in the strategy simulator Religion Inc. Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness. There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity. Game Features *A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions! *Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more! *Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours! *Hundreds of real-world religious aspects â€“ and even more to come! Learn more about world religions! *Unique active abilities for each archetype â€“ perform miracles and change the world! *Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy! Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator â€“ Religion Inc. Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

entry.title: RadarScope
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Tier 2ï¼š$99.99 â†’ $14.99 [$14.99 ~ $99.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$9.99

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Tier 2ï¼š$14.99
  • Pro Tier 1ï¼š$9.99
  • RadarScope Pro Subscriptionï¼š$9.99

Application Description

RadarScope is an AMS-award-winning weather visualization tool that empowers meteorologists, public safety officials, storm spotters, and weather enthusiasts to view a full suite of single-site radar data and related severe weather products. Your initial purchase provides professional radar visualization in a fully native app, free from distracting and invasive practices, with optional subscription packages to add even more capabilities. Whether youâ€™re scanning for a mesocycloneâ€™s tell-tale hook echo, pinpointing the landfall of a hurricaneâ€™s eye wall, or identifying velocity couplet, hail spike, or debris ball signatures, RadarScope displays native radar data in its original radial format. You see what the radar sees almost as soon as the radar sees it, with automatic updates every two to ten minutes depending on the radarâ€™s scanning strategy. Your initial app purchase includes the following: â€¢ Full suite of single-site radar products for the US, Canada, Guam, Denmark, Finland, and Germany â€¢ 6-frame radar loops â€¢ Two built-in providers for radar data â€¢ Tornado, thunderstorm, flash flood, special marine, snow squall, and extreme wind warnings in the US â€¢ Selected severe weather warnings in Canada and Australia â€¢ NWS-generated storm tracks with hail, TVS, and mesocyclone attributes â€¢ Inspector and distance tools â€¢ Color palette options for radar data â€¢ AllisonHouse data plan integration â€¢ Spotter Network integration for storm and location reporting â€¢ mPING integration for submitting weather reports to NSSL â€¢ Bundled maps with political boundaries, water bodies, and major highways, optimized for low-bandwidth use â€¢ Support for widgets and complications â€¢ Universal app for Apple platforms, including Apple Watch and Apple TV â€¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier One is an optional annual subscription that adds more features for tracking severe weather: â€¢ 30-frame radar loops â€¢ Cloud-to-ground lightning strikes â€¢ Severe weather watches in the US and Canada â€¢ Special weather statements in the US and Canada â€¢ Mesoscale convective and precipitation discussions â€¢ SPC convective, tornado, hail, wind, and fire outlooks â€¢ WPC excessive rainfall outlooks in the US â€¢ Local storm reports in the US â€¢ Custom color palette support â€¢ Multi-pane display (2 on phones; 4 on larger devices) â€¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier Two is an optional annual or monthly subscription that transforms RadarScope into a more complete visualization tool for a larger suite of weather products, including: â€¢ Everything in Pro Tier One â€¢ 50-frame radar loops â€¢ A third provider for US radar data â€¢ NEXRAD Level II radar data for the US with a 30-year historical archive â€¢ Historical NEXRAD Level III, super-res, and non-US radar data with a 30-day archive â€¢ Historical NWS bulletins with a 19-year archive â€¢ GOES East and GOES West satellite products â€¢ NSSLâ€™s Multi-Radar Multi-Sensor (MRMS) products â€¢ NCEPâ€™s Real-Time Mesoscale Assimilation (RTMA) products â€¢ Surface observations â€¢ Atmospheric soundings in the US â€¢ Hail size, hail probability, and azimuthal shear contours with a 30-day archive â€¢ More detailed transportation and satellite imagery maps â€¢ Custom color palette support for GOES, MRMS, and RTMA â€¢ Server-sent events for radar and warning updates â€¢ Cross-platform subscription sharing on up to 5 devices â€¢ Family sharing support If you choose to buy a RadarScope Pro subscription, it will be charged to your App Store account. The subscription will be auto-renewed within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the same price you originally paid. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal disabled via your App Store account settings after the purchase. Once purchased, the subscription cannot be canceled during the active subscription period. DTN is committed to safeguarding your privacy online. Our privacy policy is available for review at https://www.dtn.com/privacy-policy/ Please visit our web site for more information.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: MoneyTrack: Expense & Budget
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Lifetimeï¼š$19.99 â†’ $19.95 [$19.95 ~ $19.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • Lifetimeï¼š$19.95
  • Annualï¼š$6.00
  • Monthlyï¼š$0.99

Application Description

MoneyTrack - Smart Personal Finance Tracker Record every dollar, take control of your finances. A clutter-free budgeting app with zero ads, zero splash screens, and zero financial product promotions. â–  KEY FEATURES â€¢ Auto-Tracking: Seamlessly integrates with Shortcuts for automatic expense capture triggered by your transactions â€¢ Versatile Entries: Track income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management â€¢ Powerful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns through pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly spot financial issues â€¢ Smart Budgeting: Create annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily allowance adjustments â–  COMPREHENSIVE ASSET MANAGEMENT â€¢ Unified dashboard for all account types (cash, checking accounts, credit cards, store cards) â€¢ Balance sheet and net worth tracking for real-time financial status monitoring â€¢ Credit card management system (payment alerts, limit tracking, grace period calculation) â€¢ Multi-currency support with exchange rates for all major world currencies â–  SMART FEATURES â€¢ Multiple Books: Easily separate personal, business, and project finances â€¢ Collaborative Tracking: Invite family members to create transparent household finances â€¢ Cloud Sync: Free data backup across devices with secure protection â€¢ Easy Import/Export: Support for importing from banking apps and exporting to Excel â€¢ Recurring Transactions: Set up automatic entries that generate on schedule â€¢ Payment Plans: Track installment payments with due date reminders â€¢ Custom Categories: Create unlimited category levels to match your financial organization â–  MULTI-DEVICE EXPERIENCE Sync between iPhone, iPad and PC with instant updates, keeping your financial picture complete no matter where you are. â–  FOCUSED ON FINANCIAL WELLNESS We're dedicated to one mission â€” helping you achieve financial clarity. No investment pitches, no social distractions, just a clean and effective expense tracking experience.

entry.title: Zero One Progrise
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$2.99 â†’ $2.49 [$2.49 ~ $2.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$2.49

Application Description

Zero One Progrise brings you a complete fan-made encyclopedia of characters, Riders, Drivers, and fun quizzes. Features Character Encyclopedia: Learn about Aruto Hiden, Isamu Fuwa, Yua Yaiba, Gai Amatsu, Horobi, Jin, and more. Rider Gallery: Explore Zero-One, Vulcan, Valkyrie, Thouser, Horobi, Jin, and their different forms. Driver Showcase: Discover the Hiden Zero-One Driver, AIMS Shotriser, Thousandriver, and more â€“ tap to play original transform sounds. Quiz Challenge: Test your knowledge of characters, forms, and story details with fun trivia games. Immersive Experience: Relive the excitement with custom artwork and sound effects. Disclaimer: This is an unofficial fan app.

entry.title: Cyber Manhunt
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$4.99 â†’ $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$2.99

In-App Purchases

  • Home Sweet Homeï¼š$0.99
  • Hello World!ï¼š$0.99

Application Description

Cyber Manhunt is a Cyber-Style, Realistic- Society theme, Story-Rich indie game. The game taked place in the Republic of Alivia with some different theme stories ,but the fate of the characters is closely related in there. It will focus on social issues liking big data, hacking, citizen privacy etc... We want to reveal the profound themes behind the stories with wonderful plots and gamification. And let players pay more attention to Cyber Violence and Privacy Breaches. [Contents] â—†Chapter I: Death of a Programmer The CEO of a company committed suicide by jumping off a building, and claimed that he was extorted tens of millions by his wife. While his wife posted photos of domestic violence on social networks. Who is lying? â—†Chapter II: Invisible Eyes The indecent video of the female college student went viral on the Internet. At this moment, she was already socially dead. Who is the initiator? Who should protect the safety of women? â—†Chapter III: The Evidence Vanishes The student council president, who is both excellent in character and study, suddenly disappeared. The bullying incident made the case more complicated. Who is the murderer and who is the victim? â—†Chapter IV: The Price of Humiliation The female singer has been exposed again! Threatening letters, hype, the suicide of former girl group members... The Internet has set off a public opinion carnival again! â—†Chapter V: Immortal Code When the society is in madness, are you willing to join the Immortal Code to obtain true love and immortality? â—†DLC: Home Sweet Home Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?! â—†DLC: Hello World! Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death. But he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracyâ€¦ [Features] â—†Highly Immersive: Gamers play as a hacker in the game, accepts the commission of the company, and solve dangerous incidents. â—†Rich Gameplay: There are lots of features of Social Engineering in the game, which is including Detecting, Tracking, Puzzles-Solving, Destroying and Hacking etc.. â—†Wonderful Plots: Each chapter in the game will reflect a current hot social topic, such as: Sneak Shot, Cyber Violence, School Bullying, etc... â—†Multiple Roles: There are many different roles in this game with a flash of personality. Their stories would be dug by yourself. â—†Fully Dubbing: All the characters in the game have their own voice actors that make the game experience more immersive. â—†Original Music: There are some original songs in the game, and the lyrics and vocals are all completed by the studio. [Gameplay] â—†Web Search: You should collect basic information about the targets through the Internet search. â—†Database: You can use the database to get deep information about targets. â—†Crack: You would get passwords based on the obtained target's information, and use it to log in to accounts of different platforms. â—†Chat: The exciting thing is that you need to chat with targets by disguise and use the information to get the trust of the target. â—†Phishing: You can send phishing links to hack the targets' hardware devices, and get private information. â—†Picture Analysis: You can get valuable information and relevant clues from pictures. More advanced hacking methods will be unlocked later!

Application Screenshot

iPad
